CustomField.description: This is used to determine if the contact ownership is not correct.
CustomField.formula: AND( Hold_Out__c = false , Sales_Contact__c = true , OwnerId != Account.OwnerId , Account.Owner.IsActive = true )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is true if the owner of the contact does not match the owner of the account.
CustomField.label: Owner Mismatch
